attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Last year, HM Inspector of Constabulary Paddy Tomkins called for the establishment of a Scotland-wide "Super Force" to carry out Specialist Duties such as Armed Response and Counter-Terrorism.

The attack on Glasgow Airport exposed the weaknesses in our security; there were NO armed police on duty at the time of the attack. Scotland, like the rest of the UK, is in the front line of the War on Terror, to say nothing of the growing problem of Organised and Violent Crime...

When Glasgow has a higher murder rate than New York, it's time to set up a Scottish FBI.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
